Package entity

Class Booking

  • java.lang.Object
    • entity.Booking
  • public class Booking
extends java.lang.Object
    The Booking class represents a flat booking in the BTO housing application system. A booking is created when an applicant with a successful application selects a specific flat. Bookings are processed by officers and can be in various states (pending, confirmed, cancelled). This class manages the booking process including confirmation, cancellation, and receipt generation.

      • generateReceipt

        public Receipt generateReceipt()
        Generates a receipt for a confirmed booking. Only confirmed bookings can have receipts generated.
        Returns:
        The generated Receipt, or null if the booking is not confirmed

      • cancelBooking

        public boolean cancelBooking()
        Cancels a pending booking. Updates the booking status to cancelled and marks the application as unsuccessful.
        Returns:
        true if the booking was cancelled successfully, false if it wasn't in pending status

      • confirmBooking

        public boolean confirmBooking()
        Confirms a pending booking. Updates the booking status to confirmed, marks the application as successful, and decreases the available units count for the flat type.
        Returns:
        true if the booking was confirmed successfully, false if it wasn't in pending status

      • findBookingByDate

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Booking> findBookingByDate​(java.time.LocalDate date)
        Finds all bookings made on a specific date.
        Parameters:
        date - The date to search for
        Returns:
        ArrayList of matching Bookings, empty list if none found
